summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Callie Meier regarding a subpoena served on AIC Title. It appears to be part of the ongoing Epstein investigation, likely seeking financial or property records.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: Sends an email with an attached subpoena to Callie Meier, following up on a call they had earlier in the day.

persons.name: Callie Meier
persons.context: Addressed in the email, having had a call with Andrew earlier. The email is sent to her at an AIC Title email address.

connections.description: Andrew, an AUSA, is communicating with Callie Meier regarding a subpoena, indicating a formal legal process involving her or her company.

events.title: Subpoena served on AIC Title
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a subpoena to Callie Meier at AIC Title, following a phone call earlier that day.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to AIC Title on September 30, 2021, as part of the Epstein investigation.
The subpoena was sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative activity by federal prosecutors in 2021.
The target appears to be AIC Title, suggesting interest in property or financial records.
